snippet: The Belgrade Philharmonic hopes its first American tour, which ends with a concert at Carnegie Hall, will help raise funds for a new performance center.
abstract: Belgrade Philharmonic prepares for American tour that will culminate in concert at Carnegie Hall; organization hopes that tour will raise money from Serbian diaspora in United States to build a new concert hall in Serbia; orchestra has made an impressive recovery from brutal Balkan wars of the 1990s, boasting a remarkably diverse ensemble, but remains in financial need.
lead_paragraph: The Belgrade Philharmonic hopes its first American tour, which ends with a concert at Carnegie Hall, will help raise funds for a new performance center.

headline.seo: Belgrade Philharmonic Is Touring To Help Fund a New Home
headline.main: Well Past the Rubble, Orchestra Rebuilds
headline.print_headline: Well Past the Rubble, Orchestra Rebuilds
